message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your business. We are offering this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering its value to you is estimated at $1,200,000. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.

Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the value of the product, $1,350,000 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to offer $1,250,000 for the product. This price is fair considering my estimated value and allows for a mutually beneficial agreement. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, we are willing to accept your offer of $1,250,000 for our product. We believe this price reflects the value it brings to your business and looks forward to completing this transaction with you.
